title: Mony a pickle
creator_credit: Norman McLaren and General Post Office of Great Britain
brief_description: A short film publicising the GPO Savings Bank in London. Several film directors contributed short sequences. McLaren’s two minute sequence made use of live photography and animation of furniture and other household objects. The title is one half of a Scottish proverb whose approximate English equivalent is “Many little bits make a lot.”
